title: Wait-for-debugger-attach codepath should print what it's doing and a PID
body:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/src/XMakeCommandLine/XMake.cs#L452

Should say something like

> The environment variable MSBUILDDEBUGONSTART was set to 2. Attach a debugger to process {0} and press enter.

Otherwise you have to guess which `dotnet.exe` to attach to.
